manzils.text: ta slavetnyy Quran
Vony znayshly tse nezvychayne shcho warner z chysla yim prybuly yim! disbelievers skazalo, "Tse ye diysno nezvychayne
Pislya my vmyrayemo ta stayemo pylom; tse nemozhlyve
My znayemo tsilkom budʹ khto z nykh khto pryyizhdzhaye spozhytyy zemleyu; my mayemo tochnyy zapys
Vony vidkhylyly pravdu koly yomu prybuly yim; vony nadzvychayno zmishuyutʹsya
vony ne podyvylysya na nebo nad nymy, ta yak my skonstruyuvaly tse ta prykrasyly tse, bez vady
Ta my utvoryly zemlyu, ta rozkynenu po tse hory, ta vyrosly u tse vsi riznovydy krasyvykh zavodiv
Tse ye enlightenment, ta reminder dlya kozhnoho nabizhnyy worshiper
Ta my poslaly z neba blahoslovenna voda, shchob vyrosty z tse park ta zerna buty zibrani urozhay
Vysoki palʹmy daty, z clustered plid
Umovy dlya lyudey. Ta my ozhyvayemo z tse mertvi zemli; vy analohichno resurrected
Disbelieving pered tym, yak yim yavlyaly soboyu lyudey Noah, dwellers Russ, ta Thamoud
Ta `aad, Pharaoh, ta braty Doli
Ta dwellers lisiv, ta lyudey Tubba. Usi disbelieved kur'yery ta, otzhe, Miy retribution befell yim
my nadto burdened pershym stvorennyam? Tse chomu vony sumniv resurrection
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy, ta my znayemo shcho vin shepoche do sebe. My ye blyzhchi yomu nizh yoho jugular vena
Dva zapysu (anhely), u pravi ta u vlivo, stalo zapys
Ne vysliv vin vymovlyayutʹ bez pylʹnoho svidka
Nareshti, nemynuchyy coma smerti prybuvaye; tse ye shcho vy postaralysya unyknuty
rih duyetʹsya; tse yavlyaye soboyu poobitsyane denʹ
Kozhna dusha prybuvaye z herder ta svidkom
Vy zvychayno buly oblivious do tse. My zaraz usuyemo vashu vualʹ; sʹohodni, vash zir (takyy sylʹnyy yak) stalʹ
kompanyon skazav, "Osʹ miy formidable svidchennya
Kydayutʹ u Gehenna kozhnyy upertyy disbeliever
Forbidder dobrodiynosti, ahresora, povnoho sumnivu
Vin zdiymavsya bilya BOHA inshyy boh. Kynʹte yoho u suvoryy retribution
Yoho kompanyon skazav, "Nash Lord, ya ne pryzviv do pomylky yo; vin daleko astray
Vin skazav, "Ne tryvala vorozhnecha pered Meni; YA dostatno poperedyv vas
Nichoho ne mozhe buty zminene zaraz. YA nikoly ne unjust do lyudey
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly my prosymo Peklo, vy dosytʹ?" Tse skazhe, "Dayutʹ meni bilʹshe
Ray bude proponuvatysya do spravedlyvyy, lehko
Tse shcho vkhodylo do kompetentsiyi poobitsyane do kozhnoho repenter, steadfast
Vony reverenced naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvi, u yikhniy tayemnosti, ta prybuly wholeheartedly
Vnosyatʹ tse u spokoyu; tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Vichnosti
Vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ budʹ shcho vony bazhayutʹ tam, ta my navitʹ bilʹshe
Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim, khto buv bilʹshe potuzhni, my vynyshchyly. Vony proanalizuvaly zemlyu; vony znayshly vtechu
Tse povynno buty urok dlya kozhnoho shcho volodiye rozumom, abo vmiye pochuty ta svidok
My utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy u shesty dnyakh, ta niyaka vtoma ne torknulasya nas
Tomu, patsiyent pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta pokhvala ta glorify vash Lord pered skhodom sontsya, ta pered zakhodom sontsya
Pid chas nichni vy budete rozdumuvaty na Yoho nazvi, ta pislya toho yak prostrating
Pidhotovlyayutʹ dlya dnya koly caller vyklyky z mistsya shcho poblyzu
Koly vony chuyutʹ nemynuchyy krychatʹ; shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vy vykhodyte
My yavlyayemo soboyu kotryy kontrolʹ zhyttya ta smertʹ; do nas yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
denʹ prybude koly zemlya trishchyny pospishayuchy, dayuchy spravlyayutʹsya z nymy. Takyy sklykayuchyy lehkyy dlya nas zrobyty
My znayemo tsilkom vse vony vymovlyayutʹ, v toy chas, yak vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad nymy. Tomu, nahaduyutʹ z tse Quran, tsya kotra povaha Moyi poperedzhennya
duyuchi viter
Nosyatʹ doshch
Pryvedennya umovy
Rozpodilyayutʹ yikh yak nakazane
Shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas bezsumnivno prybudete proyty
Denʹ Vyroku ye nemynuchyy
Nezvazhayuchy na doskonalo utvorene nebo
Vy prodovzhuyetesya posperechatysya pravda
Deviating zvidty yavlyayutʹ soboyu deviators
Prykroshchi do falsifiers
U yikh blundering, vony ye povnistyu neuvazhni
Vony dopytuyutʹ Denʹ Vyroku

Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhni vynahorody Lorda, dlya vony zvychayno buly nabizhni
Ridko zrobyly vony splyatʹ vsya nich
U svitanku, vony molylysya za forgiveness
chastyna yikhnikh hroshey bula vidkladena dlya zhebraka ta needy

Ta v mezhakh sebe; vy mozhete pobachyty
U nebesakh ye vashe zabezpechennya, ta vse shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas
Lordom nebes ta zemli, tse ye takyy virnyy yak toy fakt, shcho vy rozmovlyayete
vy vidznachyly istoriyu Abraham pochesnykh hosti
Vony vidvidaly yoho, kazhuchy, "Myr." Vin skazav, "Myr do vas, neznayomtsiv
Vin poprosyv yoho rodynu pidhotovyty zhyrnu lytku
Koly vin zaproponuvav tse yim, vin zauvazhyv, vy ne hostytesya
Vin harbored strakh z nykh. Vony skazaly, "Ne mayutʹ strakha," ta vony daly harnu novynu knowledgeable syna
Yoho druzhyna bula zdyvovana. Vidznachayuchy yiyi zmorshchyv oblychchya: "YA ye sterylʹna stara zhinka
Vony skazaly, 'Takym "chynom skazaly vashoho Lorda. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient
Vin skazav, "Shcho vy azh do, O kur'yery
Vony skazaly, "My buly vidpravleni do kryminalʹnykh lyudey
My budemo yim zlyvy z skelyamy hlyny
Vidznachatysya vashym Lordom dlya porushnykiv
My todi dostavyly vsim viruyucham
My ne znayshly u tse krim odnoho budynku submitters
My vstanovlyuyemo tse yak urok dlya tsykh khto bo bolisnoho retribution
U Moses (ye urok). My poslaly yomu Pharaoh z ochevydnymy dokazamy
Ale vin prohnav, u zukhvalosti, ta skazav, "Charivnyk, abo bozhevilʹnyy
Otzhe, my pokaraly yoho ta yoho viysʹko. My kynuly yikh u more, ta vin yavlyaye soboyu osudyty
U `aad (ye urok). My poslaly na nykh z·hubnyy viter
Budʹ shcho shcho tse prybulo na nadzvychayno bulo zruynovane
U Thamoud (ye urok). Vony buly kazani, "Polyublyayutʹ tymchasovo
Vony protydiyaly komandi yikhnʹoho Lorda. Otzhe, blyskavka ukladeni yim tomu shcho vony podyvylysya
Vony mohly nikoly ne vstaty, ne vony dopomohly
Ta lyudy Noah pered shcho; vony buly bezputni lyudy
My skonstruyuvaly nebo z nashymy rukamy, ta my prodovzhymo rozshyryty tse
Ta my zrobyly zemlyu habitable; doskonalyy proekt
My utvoryly paru (muzhchyna ta zhinka) vse, shcho vy mozhete vzyaty uvahu
Vy budete vtikty do BOHA. YA posylayusʹ Yo do vas yak ochevydnykh warner
Ne vstanovlenyy bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh. YA posylayusʹ Yo do vas yak ochevydnykh warner
Stiyko, koly kur'yer poyikhav do poperednikh heneratsiy, vony skazaly, "Charivnyk," abo, "Bozhevilʹnyy
vony zrobyly dohovir z odyn odnoho? Diysno, vony porushnyky
Vy mozhete disregard yim; vy ne mozhete buty osudzhuvatysya
Ta nahaduyutʹ, dlya reminder vyhod viruyuchi
ya ne stvoryuvav jinns ta humans krim shchob obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy
ya ne potrebuyu umov z nykh, ne roblyu ya potrebuyu yikh nahoduvaty Meni
BOH yavlyaye soboyu Provaydera, Possessor vsiyeyi potuzhnosti, Vyshchoyi
porushnyky pidpaly ta zhe dolya yak yikhni poperedni kolehy; vony ne musyatʹ vyklyk
Prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieved z dnya shcho ochikuye yikh
Mt. Sinai
zapysane svyate pysannya
Publikuvav u knyhakh

exalted stelya

Niyaka syla u vsesviti ne mozhe zupynyty tse
denʹ prybude koly nebo bude nasylʹnytsʹko hrim
hory budutʹ vytyratysya
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do disbelievers
khto ye u yikh blundering, neuvazhnyy
Vony budutʹ herded u Gehenna, forcibly
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Vohonʹ u kotromu vy vykorystaly disbelieve
tse zacharuvannya, abo vy ne dyvytesʹ
Strazhdayutʹ horyachyy. Chy vy patsiyent abo neterplyachyy, tse bude te zhe dlya vas. Tse yavlyaye soboyu spravedlyvi requital za shcho vy
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta blazhenstvo
Vony polyublyayutʹ yakoho yikhnʹoho Lorda zarezervuvaly dlya nykh; yikhniy Lord zekonomyv yikh retribution Pekla
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily, v obmin na vashi pratsi
Vony rozslablyayutʹsya na rozkishnomu vbranni, ta my match yim z krasyvym podruzhzhyam

Dlya tsykh khto vvazhaly, ta yikhni dity takozh proslidkuvaly za nymy u viri, my budemo maty yikhnikh ditey pryyednuyemosʹ do nykh. My nikoly ne ne spromozhemosʹ shchob nahorodyty yikh dlya budʹ-yakoyi roboty. Kozhna lyudyna platytʹsya za yakyy vin
My budemo postachaty yikh z fruktamy ta m'yasom shcho vony lyublyatʹ
Vony otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid napoyu shcho nikoly zabrudnyuyutʹsya, ta nikoly sinful ne vypyty
Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ sluzhbovtsi lyublyatʹ zakhyshcheni perly
Vony zustrinutʹ odyn odnoho ta reminisce sered sebe
Vony skazhutʹ, "My zvychayno buly riznovyd ta skromnyy sered nashykh lyudey
BOH blahoslovyv nas, ta zekonomyv nas ahoniya khvorykh vitru
My zvychayno blahaly Yoho; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Lyub'yaznyy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Vy budete nahadaty lyudyam. Z vashym blahoslovennyam Lorda na vas, vy ni soothsayer, ni bozhevilʹnyy
Vony mozhutʹ skazaty, "Vin ye poet; dozvolʹte nam tilʹky chekayutʹ do vin ye mertvyy
Kazhutʹ, "Prodovzhuyutʹsya chekayutʹ; YA zachekayu razom z vamy
tse yikhnye sny shcho dyktuyutʹ yikhnyu povedinku, abo vony pryrodnʹo bezputni
yak kazhutʹ, 'Vin vstyh vesʹ?" Zamistʹ tsʹoho, vony prosto disbelievers
Dozvolyayutʹ yim vyroblyayutʹ Hadith lyublyatʹ tse, yakshcho vony ye pravdyvi
vony utvoryuvalysʹ z nichoho? Vony creators
vony utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu? Diysno, vony ne mayutʹ certainty
vony volodiyutʹ skarbamy vashoho Lorda? Vony u kontroli
vony pidnimayutʹsya na drabynu shcho dozvolyaye yim poslukhaty? Dozvolʹte yikhnim slukhachyam pokazuyutʹ yikhniy dokaz
Vin maye dochok, v toy chas, yak vy maye syniv
vy prosyte yikh dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty, ta vony burdened z dopomohoyu tsʹoho
vony znayutʹ maybutnye, ta tse zapysalo
vony roblyatʹ zmovu ta zamyshlyayutʹ? disbelievers' skhemy backfire proty nykh
vony mayutʹ inshoho boha bilya BOHA? BOH glorified, daleko nahori mayuchi partnery
Koly vony bachatʹ , shcho masy padaye z neba, vony skazhutʹ, "Nahromadyly khmary
Disregard yim do vony zustrichayutʹ denʹ u kotromu vony vrazhayutʹsya
Na shcho denʹ, yikhni skhemy ne zakhystyatʹ yikh, ne budutʹ vony budutʹ dopomozheni
Tsey khto porushuyutʹ zaznayutʹ retribution tut, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh ne znayutʹ
Vy budete steadfastly persevere u vykonuyuchomu vashomu Lordi komanda - vy vmiyete u nashykh ochakh ta glorify ta khvalyte vashoho Lorda koly vy vstayete
Takozh pid chas nochi glorify Yo, ta u svitanku yak zirky v'yanutʹ daleko
Yak zirky vpaly daleko
Vash tovarysh (Muhammad) ne astray, ne vin obmanuv

Dyktuvav naybilʹshym Potuzhnyy
Possessor vsʹoho avtorytetu. Z Yoho nayvyshchoyi vysoty
U nayvyshchomu obriyu
Vin prytyahnuv blyzhche rukhayuchysʹ vnyz
Do Vin stav yak zakryvayutʹ yak mozhlyvyy
Vin todi vidkryv do Yoho sluzhbovtsya shcho musytʹ buty vidkrytyy
rozum nikoly skladenyy shcho tse dyvylosya
vy piddayete sumnivu shcho vin dyvyvsya

U ostatochnomu punkti

vse mistse overwhelmed
ochi ne waver, ne idutʹ slipi
Vin pobachyv velyki znaky yoho Lorda
Porivnyuyutʹ tse z zhinochymy idolamy Allaat ta Alʹ-`uzzah
Ta Manaat, tretiy
vy mayete syniv, v toy chas, yak Vin maye tsey tomu shcho dochky

Tsey ale nazvy shcho vy zahrymuvalysʹ, vy ta vashi forefathers. BOH nikoly upovnovazhenyy takyy blasphemy. Vony sliduyutʹ za prypushchennyam, ta personalʹne bazhannya, koly virne kerivnytstvo prybulo yim herein z yikhnʹoho Lorda
Shcho tse shcho lyudsʹke buty bazhannyamy
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ i U maybutnʹomu, i tse svit
Ne navitʹ anhely u nebesakh volodiyutʹ avtorytetom intercede. Yedyni dozvoleni BOHOM ye tsey khto diyutʹ z·hidno z Yoho bude ta Yoho skhvalennya
Tsey khto disbelieve u U maybutnʹomu daly anhely zhinochi nazvy
Vony ne maly znannya pro tse; vony tilʹky prypustyly. Prypushchennya ni zamina dlya pravdy
Vy budete disregard tsey khto prohanyayutʹ z nashoho povidomlennya, ta stayete preoccupied z tse svitovo dovichnym
Tse yavlyaye soboyu miru yikhnʹoho znannya. Vash Lord znaye tsilkom tsi khto zbylysya z shlyakhu daleko z Yoho shlyakhu, ta Vin znaye tsilkom tsi khto keruyutʹsya
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Vin bude requite tsey khto zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo dlya yikhnikh pratsʹ, ta nahorodytʹ spravedlyvyy dlya yikhnʹoho righteousness

Vony unykayutʹ velykykh hrikhiv ta porushennya, krim dlya druhoryadnykh zlochyniv. Vash forgiveness Lorda ye velycheznyy. Vin ye tsilkom obiznan z vas z Vin zapochatkuvav vas z zemli, ta v toy chas, yak vy embryos u vashykh shlunkakh materiv. Tomu, ne exalt sebe; Vin znaye tsilkom spravedlyvyy
vy vidznachyly khto prohnav

vin ovolodiv znannyam maybutnʹoho? Vin mih pobachyty tse

Todi vony budutʹ platytysya tsilkom dlya takykh pratsʹ

Hodyna prybula blyzhcha, ta misyatsʹ rozkolovsya
Todi vony pobachyly chudo; ale vony prohnaly ta skazaly, "Stare zacharuvannya
Vony disbelieved, proslidkuvaly za yikhnimy dumkamy, ta dotrymuvalysʹ yikhnikh starykh tradytsiy
Dostatni poperedzhennya buly dostavleni do pylʹnykh yim
Velykyy wisdom; ale vsi poperedzhennya marno
Ihnoruyutʹ yikh; denʹ prybude koly caller oholosytʹ strashne lykho
Z yikhnimy ochamy prynyzheni, vony vytikayutʹ z graves lyublyatʹ rozihnani saranu
Tomu shcho vony vidpovidayutʹ do caller, disbelievers skazhutʹ, "Tse ye tyazhkyy denʹ

My todi vidkryly bramy neba, l'yuchy vodu

Yak strashnyy Miy retribution pislya poperedzhenʹ

Thamoud vidkhylyv poperedzhennya
Vony skazaly, "Budutʹ my slidkuyemo odni z nas; lyudsʹkyy? My todi zablukayemosʹ, todi zakinchuyemosʹ u Pekli
povidomlennya prybulo vnyz yomu, zamistʹ nas? Vin ye ochevydnyy brekhun
Vony znaydutʹ zavtra khto ochevydnyy brekhun
My posylayemo verblyudu yak test dlya nykh. Sposterihayte yikh ta patsiyent
Informuyutʹ yikh shcho voda povynna buty rozdilena sered nykh; (verblyud) povynen buty dozvolenyy shchob vypyty na yiy pryznachenyy denʹ

My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
lyudy Doli vidkhylyly poperedzhennya

My blahoslovyly yoho ta yoho rodynu; my takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo appreciative
Vin poperedyv yikh pro nash requital, ale vony ridiculed poperedzhennya
Vony vely perehovory z nym pro yoho hosti; my blinded yim. Zaznayte Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni
Rano nastupne ranok, spustoshlyvyy retribution vrazyty yikh
Zaznayutʹ Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni

vashi disbelievers krashche nizh disbelievers? Vy uvilʹnyuvalysʹ svyatym pysannyam
Mozhlyvo vony dumayutʹ, "My budemo peremozhtsi
Usi budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky; vony povernutʹsya navkolo ta tikayutʹ
Hodyna ochikuye yikh, ta Hodyna ye daleko hirsha ta bilʹshe bolisnyy

Vse utvorene my akuratno obmiryuyetʹsya
Nashi komandy roblyatʹsya v mezhakh blymayutʹ oka

Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty

Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
My zaklykayemo vas vvazhaty za, O humans ta jinns
Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
O vy jinns ta humans, yakshcho vy mozhete pronyknuty do zovnishnikh mezh neba ta zemli, idete vpered ta pronykayete. Vy ne mozhete pronyknuty bez upovnovazhennya
Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty

Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
Koly nebo rozkladayetʹsya, ta oboroty pidnnyalysya kolʹorovi lyublyatʹ farbu
Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty

Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
(Tse tomu, shcho) vynuvatyy bude vyznavatysya yikhnimy pohlyadamy; vony budutʹ bratysya forelocks ta nohy
Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
Tse Gehenna shcho vynuvatyy zvychayno zaperechuvalo
Vony rozpovsyudyatʹsya mizh tse ta nesterpnym inferno

Dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy velychnistʹ yikhnʹoho Lorda, dvokh parku (dlya jinns ta dlya humans)

Niyaki lyudsʹki kolysʹ zatorknuti yim, ne jinn

Vony rozslablyayutʹsya na zelenykh kylymakh, u krasyvomu otochenni
Kotryy vashykh dyv Lorda vy mozhete zaperechyty
Naybilʹsh exalted yavlyaye soboyu nazvu vashoho Lorda, Possessor Velychnosti ta Chesti. . . V im'ya Boha, Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnoho
Koly nemynuchyy prybuvaye proyty
Nichoho ne mozhe zupynyty tse z vidbuvayuchoho
Tse opustytʹsya deyake, ta pidnimayutʹ inshi
zemlya bude trusytysya
hory budutʹ vytyratysya
Tak, yakby vony nikoly ne isnuvaly
Vy budete stratified u try riznovydy
Tsey khto zasluzhyly blazhenstvo bude u blazhenstvi
Tsey khto zasluzhyly neshchastya bude u neshchasti
Todi ye elita elity
Vony ye tsey khto bude naybilʹsh blyzʹkyy (do Boha)
U parku blazhenstva
Bahato z pershykh heneratsiy
Malo z piznishykh heneratsiy
Na rozkishnomu vbranni
Polyublyayutʹ vse, vony budutʹ susidy
Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ nevmyrushchi sluzhbovtsi
Z chashkamy, hlekamy ta chystymy napoyim
Vony nikoly ne bihayutʹ, ne roblyatʹ vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ nabrydneni
Frukty yikhnʹoho vyboru

Tilʹky vysliv: "Myr, myr
Tsey prava storona, bude na pravi storona

Abundant voda

Rozkishne vbrannya

Dlya tsykh na pravi storona

Bahato z piznishykh heneratsiy

U neshchasti ta inferno
Rivna yikhnya tinʹ ye haryacha
Nikoly ne prokholodnyy, nikoly ne dopustymyy
Vony zvychayno buly bahati
Vony napolyahaly na velykyy blasphemy
Vony skazaly, "Pislya my vmyrayemo ta obih vyterty pyl z ta kistky, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected
tse vklyuchaye nash forefathers
Kazhutʹ, ranni heneratsiyi ta piznishi heneratsiyi
Bude sklykatysya do zboriv na predetermined denʹ
Todi vy, O disbelieving strayers
z'yidyatʹ z derev bitterness
Zapovnennya vashykh shlunkiv zvidty
Todi p'yutʹ na vershyni tse hellish napiy
Todi dodayutʹ napiy pisku
Takyy yikhnya aktsiya na Dni Vyroku
My utvoryly vas, yakshcho vy mohly tilʹky poviryty
vy vidznachyly semen shcho vy produktsiya
vy utvoryly tse, abo zrobyly my
My predetermined smertʹ dlya vas. Nichoho ne mozhe zupynyty nas
z zaminyayuchykh novykh heneratsiy u vashomu mistsi, ta vstanovlennya yaki vy ne znayete
Vy znayete pro pershe stvorennya. Vy ne zapam'yatayete
vy vidznachyly zerno vy znimayete urozhay
vy vyrostyly yikh, abo zrobyly my
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo povernuty tse u sino. Todi vy budete horyuvaty
My zahubyly
My pozbavlyayemosya
vy vidznachyly vodnyy napiy vas
vy poslaly tse vnyz z khmar, abo zrobyly my
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo vstyhnuty soloni. Vy povynni buty vdyachni
vy vidznachyly vohonʹ vy ignite
vy zapochatkuvaly yoho derevo, abo zrobyly my
My nadaly tse reminder, ta korysnyy instrument dlya korystuvachiv
Vy budete glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, Velykoho
ya prysyahayu pozytsiyamy zirok
Tse ye klyatva, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly, shcho awesome
Tse ye pochesnyy Quran
U zakhyshcheniy knyzi
Nikhto ne mozhe skhopyty tse krim vidverte
vidkryttya z Lorda vsesvitu
vy disregarding tsya rozpovidʹ
vy vstyhayete vashi dilovi shcho vy disbelieve
Koly chas prybuvaye ta tse (vasha dusha) dosyahaye vashoho horla
vy budete todi rozzyratysya
My ye blyzhchi yomu nizh vy, ale vy ne dyvytesʹ
Yakshcho tse ye virni shcho vy ne budete u borhu pered budʹ-yakym oblikom
chomu vy ne restavruyete (vasha dusha), yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Yakshcho vin ye odyn z tsʹoho zakryttya do Meni
todi radistʹ, kvity, ta park blazhenstva
Ta yakshcho vin ye odyn z prava
myr yavlyaye soboyu dolyu tsykh na pravi
Ale yakshcho vin ye odyn z disbelievers, strayers
todi abode inferno
ta horyachyy u Pekli
Tse yavlyaye soboyu absolyutnu pravdu
Vy budete glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, Velykoho
Glorifying BOH vse u nebi ta zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Yomu nalezhytʹ tsaryuvannyu neba ta zemli. Vin kontrolyuye zhyttya ta smertʹ. Vin Omnipotent
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Alʹfu ta Omega. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Krayniy ta Nayhlybshyy. Vin znaye tsilkom vsi rechi

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu u shesty dnyakh, todi prypustyv vesʹ avtorytet. Vin znaye vse shcho vstupaye do zemli, ta vse shcho vytikaye z tse, ta vse shcho prybuvaye vnyz z neba, ta vse shcho pidnimayetʹsya u tse. Vin z vamy de zavhodno vy mozhete buty. BOH Seer vse vy
Yomu nalezhytʹ tsaryuvannyu neba ta zemli. Vsi materialy kontrolyuyutʹsya BOHOM
Vin zlyvaye nich u denʹ, ta zlyvaye denʹ u nich. Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
Viryte v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta dayete z yakyy Vin podaruvav vas. Tsey sered vas shcho vvazhayete ta dayete (do dobrodiynosti) zasluzhyly velyku vynahorodu
Chomu vy ne musyte viryty v BOHU koly kur'yer zaproshuye vas viryty v vashomu Lordu? Vin vzyav zastavu vid vas, yakshcho vy viruyuchi
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye vnyz do Yoho sluzhbovtsya yasni vidkryttya, aby pryvesty vas z temryavy u svitlo. BOH Compassionate do vas, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnykh

Chomu vy ne vytrachayete v im'ya BOHA, koly BOH volodiye vsim bahat·stvom u nebi ta zemli? Rozriznenyy z reshty ye tsi sered vas kotrykh vytrachayete pered peremohoyu ta dokladayete zusylʹ. Vony dosyahayutʹ bilʹshoho rozryadu nizh khto vytrachayutʹ pislya peremohy ta dokladayutʹ zusylʹ. Dlya kozhnoho, BOHA obitsyaye ryatuvannya. BOH Cognizant vse vy
Khto bazhayutʹ pozychyty BOHA pozyka righteousness, do tse prymnozhylysya dlya nʹoho mahistralʹ, ta kinetsʹ z velykodushnoyu vynahorodoyu

denʹ prybude koly vy dyvytesʹ viryachi lyudyam ta zhinkam z yikhnimy vohnyamy vyprominyuyuchymy poperedu nykh ta yikh vypravytysya. Harna novyna ye vasha shcho, na shcho denʹ, vy budete maty park z techuchymy potokamy. Vy budete perebuvaty tam zavzhdy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu velykyy triumf

Na shcho denʹ, lyudy lytsemira ta zhinky skazhutʹ tsym khto vvazhaly, 'Budʹ "laska dozvolʹte nam pohlynuty deyake z vashoho svitla." Tse bude kazatysya, "Idete nazad pozadu vas, ta shukayete svitla." Bar'yer bude vstanovlyuvatysya mizh nymy, chyyi vorota vidokremlyuye myloserdya na vnutrishniy storoni, z retribution na zovnishniy storoni

Vony zaklykayutʹ na nykh, my ne z vamy?" Vony vidpovidyatʹ, "Tak, ale vy obduryly vashi dushi, vahalysya, maly sumniv, ta staly pryzvedeni do pomylky wishful myslennyam, do BOZHOHO vyroku prybuly. Vy buly vidvedeni z BOHA ilyuziyamy
Tomu, sʹohodni niyakyy vykup ne mozhe buty vzyatyy vid vas, ne z tsykh khto disbelieved. Vash abode yavlyaye soboyu vohonʹ; tse - vash lord, ta neshchasnyy abode

tse ne chas dlya tsykh khto virytʹsya shchob vidkryty yikhni serdenʹka dlya BOZHOHO povidomlennya, ta pravda shcho vidkryvayetʹsya herein? Vony ne musyatʹ vyhlyadaty yak poslidovnyky poperednikh svyatykh pysannya chyyi serdenʹka staly zatverdili z chasom ta, otzhe, bahato z nykh povernuti bezputnym
Znayutʹ shcho BOH vidnovlyuye zemlyu pislya tse vmer. My takym chynom roz'yasnyuyemo apokalipsys dlya vas, shcho vy mozhete zrozumity
Bezsumnivno, blahodiyni lyudy ta zhinky, pozychyly BOHA pozyka dobroty. Vony otrymayutʹ yikhnyu vynahorodu prymnozhylysya mahistralʹ; vony zasluzhyly velykodushnu vynahorodu

Tsey khto viryly v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeram yavlyayutʹ soboyu saints ta muchenyky. Zarezervuvaly dlya nykh u yikhnʹomu Lordi yikhni vynahorody ta yikhnye svitlo. Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieved ta vidkhylyv nashi vidkryttya, vony zaznaly Pekla

Znayutʹ shcho tse svitovo zhyttya ni bilʹsh nizh hra ta ihry, ta khvastayuchi sered vas, ta nakopychennya hroshey ta ditey. Tse vyhlyadaye yak abundant doshch shcho vyroblyaye zavody ta zadovolʹnyaye disbelievers. Ale todi obih zavodiv u daremne sino, ta duyutʹsya daleko vitrom. U U maybutnʹomu ye abo suvoryy retribution, abo forgiveness z BOHA ta skhvalennya. Tse svitovo zhyttya ne ye bilʹsh nizh tymchasova ilyuziya

Tomu, vy budete bihty do forgiveness z vashoho Lorda, ta Ray chyya shyryna okhoplyuye nebesa ta zemlyu. Tse ochikuye tsykh khto viryly v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeram. Takyy BOZHA charivnistʹ shcho Vin daruye whomever Vin wills. BOH Possessor Neobmezhenoyi Charivnosti
Budʹ shcho shcho vidbuvayetʹsya na zemli, abo do vas, vzhe zapysuvatysya, navitʹ pered stvorennyam. Tse ye lehke dlya BOHA zrobyty
Otzhe, vy ne musyte sumuvaty nad budʹ shcho vy propuskayete, ne budete hordi budʹ shcho Vin podaruvav vas. BOH ne lyubytʹ tsi khto ye khvalʹkuvatyy, hordyy
Vony stingy, ta nakazuyutʹ lyudyam buty stingy. Yakshcho kozhnyy prohanyaye, todi BOH yavlyaye soboyu Bahatyy, Praiseworthy

My poslaly nashym kur'yeram pidtrymanym yasnymy dokazamy, ta my poslaly vnyz yim svyate pysannya ta zakon, shcho lyudy mozhutʹ uphold spravedlyvistʹ. Ta my poslaly vnyz zalizo, prychomu ye syla, ta bahato vyhod dlya lyudey. Vse tse na poryadku dennomu dlya BOHA rozriznyty tsi khto by pidtrymav Yoho ta Yoho kur'yeriv, na viri. BOH ye Potuzhnyy, Mohutniy
My poslaly Noah ta Abraham, ta my harantuvaly yikhnim nashchadkam prophethood ta svyate pysannya. Deyakyy z nykh keruvalysʹ, v toy chas, yak bahato buly bezputni

Nastupni yim, my poslaly nashym kur'yeram. My poslaly Isusu syn Mary, ta my daly yomu Injeel (Yevanheliye), ta my rozmistyly u serdenʹkakh yoho dobroty poslidovnykiv ta myloserdya. Ale vony vynayshly hermitism kotryy my nikoly ne ukhvalyly dlya nykh. Vsi my poprosyly yikh zrobyty musymo uphold zapovidi skhvaleni BOHOM. Ale vony ne uphold povidomlennya tomu shcho vony musyatʹ. Otzhe, my daly tsym khto vvazhaly sered nykh yikhnya vynahoroda, v toy chas, yak bahato z nykh bula bezputna

O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy budete BOH povahy ta viryte v Yoho kur'yeru. Vin todi harantuye vy podvoyuyete vynahorodu z Yoho myloserdya, nadayete pravo vam z svitlom keruvaty vamy, ta probachayete vam. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Otzhe, poslidovnyky poperednʹoho svyatoho pysannya musyatʹ znaty shcho vony ne monopolizuvaly BOZHE myloserdya ta charivnistʹ, ta shcho vsya charivnistʹ ye u BOZHIY rutsi. Vin daruye tse na whomever Vin wills. BOH Possessor Neobmezhenoyi Charivnosti
BOH pochuv zhinku kotru obhovoryv z vamy pro yiyi cholovika, ta poskarzhyvsya do BOHA. BOH pochuv vse dva z vy obhovoryly. BOH Slukhach, Seer

Tsey sered vas kotri estrange yikhni zhinky (zayavlyayuchy yikh yak zaboronene u stati) yak yikhni materi znayutʹ povni dobre shcho vony ne yikhni materi. Yikhni materi yavlyayutʹ soboyu zhinok shcho narodyly yikh. Diysno, vony zdiysnyuyutʹ blasphemy ta falsehood. BOH Pardoner, Forgiver

Tsey khto estrange yikhni zhinky u tsʹomu sposobi, todi svyatyatʹ z tsʹoho chasu, budutʹ vidshkoduvaty vyzvolyayuchy raba pered tym yak ponovlyuvaty yikhni stattyevi vidnoshennya. Tse musytʹ vysvitlyty vas. BOH Cognizant vse vy

Yakshcho vy ne mozhete znayty raba vyzvolyty, vy budete shvydkykh dva poslidovnykh misyatsya pered tym yak ponovlyuvaty stattyevi vidnoshennya. Yakshcho vy ne mozhete shvydko, todi vy budete nahoduvaty shistdesyat bidni lyudy. Vy budete viryty v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru. Tse - BOZHI zakony. disbelievers zaznaly bolisnoho retribution

Bezsumnivno, tsey khto boryutʹsya BOH ta Yoho kur'yer zdiysnyuyutʹsya shchob zavdaty porazky, lyublyatʹ yikhnikh poperednikh kolehy buv zdiysnenyy do porazky. My poslaly vnyz yasni dokazy, ta rejectors zaznaly hanebnoho retribution
denʹ prybude koly BOH bude resurrect yim vsi, todi informuyutʹ yikh vse vony zrobyly. BOH zapysav vse, v toy chas, yak vony zabuly tse. BOH zasvidchuye vsi rechi

vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH znaye vse u nebi ta vse na zemli? Niyakykh try lyudey ne mozhutʹ robyty zmovu sekretno bez Nʹoho buty yikhnim chetvertyy, ne p'yatʹ bez Nʹoho yavlyayuchymy soboyu shostyy, ne menshe, nizh shcho, ne bilʹshe, bez Nʹoho buduchy tam z nymy de zavhodno vony mozhutʹ buty. Todi, na Dni Resurrection, Vin poinformuye yikh vse vony zrobyly. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi

vy vidznachyly tsi komu buly nakazanyy z roblyachoho zmovu sekretno, todi napolyahayete na roblyachomu zmovu? Vony roblyatʹ zmovu zdiysnyty hrikh, porushennya, ta disobedience kur'yera. Koly vony prybuvayutʹ do vas, vony vitayutʹ vas z pryvitannyam za vynyatkom shcho ukhvalyuvaly BOHOM. Yak kazhutʹ vseredyni sebe, "BOH ne pokaraye nas dlya nashykh vysloviv." Yikhniy tilʹky requital Gehenna, prychomu vony horyatʹ; shcho neshchasna dolya

O vy shcho vvazhayete, yakshcho vy povynni prysudyty sekretno, vas ne budete prysudyty zdiysnyty hrikh, porushennya, ta ne pidkoryatysya kur'yeru. Vy budete prysudyty popratsyuvaty righteousness ta piety. Vy budete BOH povahy, pered komu vy budete sklykatysya
Sekretna zmova yavlyaye soboyu ideyu chorta, cherez kotryy vin prahne zavdaty bilʹ tsym khto vvazhaly. Ale, vin ne mozhe zavdaty bilʹ yim proty BOZHOHO bude. U BOHU viruyuchi budutʹ dovira

O vy shcho vvazhayete, yakshcho vy rozpovidayetesʹ, 'Budʹ "laska zrobitʹ prymishchennya," vy budete zrobyty prymishchennya protyahom odyn odnoho shchob sisty. BOH todi zrobytʹ prymishchennya dlya vas. Yakshcho vy prosytesʹ shchob vstaty ta zmina misʹtsya, vstayete ta zmina misʹtsya. BOH pidnimaye ts sered vas shcho vvazhayete, ta tsey khto nabuvayutʹ znannya vyshche vyshykuyetʹsya. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy

O vy shcho vvazhayete, koly vy bazhayete prysudyty z kur'yerom, vy budete zaproponuvaty dobrodiynistʹ (do bidnu) pered tym, yak vy tak. Tse ye krashche dlya vas, ta bilʹsh chystykh. Yakshcho vy ne mozhete buty spromozhnym prydbaty tse, todi BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Yakshcho vy ne spromohlysya shchob daty dobrodiynistʹ pered tym yak prysudzhuvaty, todi kayalysya z tsʹoho chasu, BOH vyznaye vashe kayattya. Vy budete zauvazhyty kontaktni molytvy (Salat), dayete obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat), ta pidkoryayetesya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
vy vidznachyly tsi khto befriended lyudy z kym BOH hnivayetʹsya? Vony ni nalezhatʹ z vamy, ni z nymy. Vony navmysne prysyahayutʹ brekhnya
BOH maye hotovi do nykh suvoryy retribution. Neshchasnyy diysno yaki vony zvychayno robyly
Vony vykorystaly yikhni klyatvy yak zasoby vidkhylyayuchykh z shlyakhu BOHA. Otzhe, vony zaznaly hanebnoho retribution
Ni yikhni hroshi, ni yikhni dity dopomozhutʹ yim proty BOHA. Vony pidpaly hellfire, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy

Denʹ prybude koly BOH resurrects yim vsi. Vony prysyahnutʹsya yomu todi, tilʹky tomu shcho vony prysyahayutʹ do vas zaraz, myslennya shcho vony diysno pravo! Diysno, vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnykh brekhuniv
chort ovolodiv nymy, ta vyklykav yikh disregard BOZHE povidomlennya. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu storonu chorta. Absolyutno, storona chorta yavlyayutʹ soboyu losers
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto protystavlyayutʹ BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera bude z lowliest
BOH ukhvalyv: I ta Moyi kur'yery budutʹ naybilʹsh bezperechno peremahaty." BOH ye Potuzhnyy, Mohutniy

Vy ne znaydete lyudey shcho viryatʹ v BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dnyu befriending tsey khto protystavlyayutʹ BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera, navitʹ yakshcho vony yikhni batʹky, abo yikhni dity, abo yikhni siblings, abo yikhnye plem'ya. Dlya tsey, Vin ukhvalyuye viru u yikhni serdenʹka, ta pidtrymuye yikh z natkhnennyam z Yoho, ta dopuskaye yikh u park z techuchymy potokamy prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. BOH zadovolʹnyayetʹsya z nymy, ta vony zadovolʹnyayutʹsya z Nym. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu storonu BOHA. Naybilʹsh bezperechno, BOZHA storona yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Glorifying BOH vse u nebi ta zemli, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto evicted tsey khto disbelieved sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya z yikhnikh domivok u masi vykhid. Vy nikoly ne podumaly, kotri vony pereyidutʹ, ta vony podumaly, kotri yikhni pidhotuvannya zakhystyatʹ yikh z BOHA. Ale todi BOH prybuv yim zvidky vony nikoly ochikuvani, ta ne kynuly teror u yikhni serdenʹka. Otzhe, vony pokynuly yikhni domivky na yikhnʹomu vlasnomu volʹovomu akti, krim tysku z viruyuchiv. Vy musyte dovidatysya z tse, O vy shcho volodiyete zorom
Yakshcho b BOH ne prymusyv yikh pereyikhaty, Vin by requited yim u tsʹomu zhytti (navitʹ hirshomu nizh prymushuyuchi yim pereyikhaty). U U maybutnʹomu Vin zdiysnytʹ yikh do retribution Pekla
Tse tomu, shcho vony protystavyly BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera. Dlya tsykh khto protystavlyayutʹ BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera, BOH ye naybilʹsh chitkyy u prymushuyuchomu retribution
Chy vy rubayete derevo abo lyshayete tse vstanovlene na yoho korpusi ye z·hidno z BOZHYM budete. Vin bezsumnivno prynyzytʹ bezputnyy

Shchob ni BOH restavruvav dlya Yoho kur'yera buv ne rezulʹtat vashykh zusylʹ viyny, vy borolysʹ chy na konyakh abo pishky. BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye Yoho kur'yeram proty whomever Vin wills. BOH Omnipotent

Shchob ni BOH restavruvav do Yoho kur'yera z (zavdavav porazky) spilʹnoty budutʹ poyikhaty do BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera (u vyhlyadi dobrodiynosti). Vy budete daty tse rodycham, syrotam, bidnym, ta mandruyuchym chuzhym. Otzhe, tse ne zalyshytʹsya monopolizovane sylʹnyy sered vas. Vy mozhete utrymaty psuyetʹsya dani vam kur'yerom, ale ne berete shcho vin nakazuye vam z vzyattya. Vy budete BOH povahy. BOH ye chitkyy u prymushuyuchomu retribution

(Vy budete daty) do needy khto imihruvav. Vony evicted z yikhnikh domivok ta pozbavlyalysʹ yikh vlasnistʹ, tomu, shcho vony shukaly BOZHOYI charivnosti ta nasolody, ta tomu, shcho vony pidtrymaly BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera. Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu pravdyvyy

Yak dlya tsykh khto yakshcho yim z domom ta prytulkom, ta viruyuchi pered tym, yak yim, vony lyublyatʹ tsi khto imihruvaly yim, ta znakhodyatʹ niyake vahannya u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh u dopomahayuchykh yim. Faktychno, vony lehko dayutʹ yim priorytet nahori sebe, rivni koly vony sebe potrebuyutʹ shcho vony viddayutʹ. Diysno, tsey khto dolayutʹ yikhniy pryrodnyy stinginess yavlyayutʹ soboyu uspishni

Tsey khto staly viruyuchamy pislya nykh kazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, probachayutʹ nam ta nashym bratam shcho pereduvaly nam do viry, ta derzhatʹ nashi serdenʹka z harboring budʹ-yaka nenavystʹ do tsykh khto vvazhaly. Nash Lord, Vy Compassionate, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Mayete vas vydatnyy tsey khto muchytesʹ z hypocrisy, ta yak vony skazaly yikhnim kompanyonam u disbelief sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, "Yakshcho vy evicted my vyydemo z vamy, ta nikoly ne pidkorymosʹ budʹ khto khto protystavlyaye vas. Yakshcho budʹ khto biy vy, my budemo borotysʹ na vashiy storoni." BOH daye svidchennya shcho vony brekhuny

Faktychno, yakshcho vony evicted, vony by ne vyyshly z nymy, ta yakshcho budʹ khto borolysʹ yim, vony by ne pidtrymaly yikh. Navitʹ yakshcho b vony pidtrymaly yikh, vony by povernulysya navkolo ta fled. Vony mohly nikoly ne peremohty
Diysno, vy vrazhayete bilʹshe teroru u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh nizh yikhniy strakh BOHA. Tse tomu, shcho vony lyudy shcho ne rozumiyutʹ

Vony ne pryyizhdzhayutʹ razom borotysʹ vy yakshcho ne vony ye u dobre-shielded budynky, abo pozadu stin. Yikh mozhe z'yavlyayetʹsya formidable sered sebe. Vy by podumaly shcho vony poyednuyutʹsya, koly faktychno yikhni serdenʹka dilyatʹsya. Tse tomu, shcho vony lyudy shcho ne rozumiyutʹ
Yikhnya dolya yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy tomu shcho yikhni kolehy shcho pereduvaly yim. Vony zaznaly naslidkiv yikhnikh rishenʹ. Vony zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
Vony vyhlyadayutʹ yak chort: vin kazhe do lyudsʹkyy buduchy, "Disbelieve," todi yak tilʹky vin disbelieves, vin kazhe, "ya zrikayusya vas. YA bo BOHA, Lorda vsesvitu
dolya dlya obydva z nykh yavlyaye soboyu Hellfire, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu requital dlya porushnykiv
O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy budete BOH povahy, ta dozvolyayete kozhnu dushu vyvchayete shcho tse poslav vpered dlya zavtra. Vy budete BOH povahy; BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
Ne vyhlyadayutʹ yak tsey khto zabuly BOHA, takym chynom Vin zrobyv yim zabuvayutʹ sebe. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu bezputnyy
Ne rivnyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu dwellers Hellfire ta dwellers Rayu; dwellers Rayu yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Yakshcho b my vidkryly tse Quran do hory, vy by pobachyly tse dryzhache, kryshyvshy, z povahy dlya BOHA. My tsytuyemo tsi pryklady dlya lyudey, shcho vony mozhutʹ viddzerkalyty
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnoho BOHA; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnoho BOHA; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Korolʹ, naybilʹsh Svyashchennyy, Myr, naybilʹsh Viddanyy, Vyshchyy, Mohutniy, naybilʹsh Potuzhnyy, naybilʹsh Dignified. BOH glorified; daleko nahori mayuchi partnery
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odnoho BOHA; Creator, Initiator, Dyzayner. Yomu nalezhaty naybilʹshym krasyvym nazvam. Glorifying Yo vse u nebi ta zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy ne budete befriend Moyi vorohy ta vashi vorohy, prostyahayuche kokhannya ta druzhba yim, nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vony disbelieved u pravdi shcho prybuly do vas. Vony peresliduyutʹ kur'yera, ta vy, tilʹky tomu, shcho vy viryte v BOHU, vashomu Lordu. Yakshcho vy mobilizovuyete borotysya u Moyiy prychyni, shukayuchy Moyikh blahoslovennya, yak vy sekretno mozhete polyubyty yikh? YA znayu tsilkom vse vy prykhovuyete, ta vse vy zayavlyayete. Tsey sered vas shcho robyte tse diysno zbylysya z shlyakhu pravo shlyakh
Koly zavhodno vony zustrichayutʹ vas, vony obroblyayutʹ vas tomu shcho vorohy, ta zavdayutʹ bilʹ vam z yikhnimy rukamy ta yazykamy. Vony bazhayutʹ vas disbelieve
Vashi rodychi ta vashi hroshi mozhutʹ nikoly ne dopomohty vam. Na Dni Resurrection, Vin bude pryymaty rishennya sered vas. BOH Seer vse vy

harnyy pryklad ye vstanovlenyy dlya vas Abraham ta tsey z nym. Vony skazaly yikhnim lyudyam, "My zrikayemosʹ vas ta idoliv shcho vy obozhnyuyete krim BOHA. My denonsuyemo vas, ta vy nichoho ne pobachyte z nas krim vorozhosti ta nenavysti do vy viryte v BOHU YEDYNOMU." Ale, pomylka bula zdiysnena Abraham koly vin skazav yoho batʹkovi, "ya budu molytysya za vash forgiveness, ale ya ne volodiyu potuzhnistyu zakhystyty vas z BOHA." "Nash Lord, my doviryayemo u Vas, ta pidkoryayetesya do Vas; do Vy yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
Nash Lord, dozvolyav nam ne budutʹ pryhnichenyy tsymy khto disbelieved, ta probachayutʹ nam. Vy yavlyayete soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
harnyy pryklad ye vstanovlenyy nymy dlya tsykh khto shukayutʹ BOHA ta ostannʹoho Dnya. Yak dlya tsykh khto prohanyayutʹ, BOH ye u ne treba (z nykh), Naybilʹsh Praiseworthy
BOH mozhe zminyty vorozhistʹ mizh vamy ta yim u kokhannya. BOH Omnipotent. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
BOH ne nakazuye vam z befriending tsey khto ne boretesʹ vy vnaslidok relihiyi, ta ne evict vy z vashykh domivok. Vy mozhete befriend yim ta budutʹ rivnopravni do nykh. BOH lyubytʹ rivnopravnyy

BOH nakazuye vam tilʹky z befriending tsey khto boryutʹsya vy vnaslidok relihiyi, evict vy z vashykh domivok, ta diapazon razom z inshymy zaslaty vas. Vy ne budete befriend yim. Tsey khto befriend yim yavlyayutʹ soboyu porushnykiv

O vy shcho vvazhayete, viryachy zhinkam (pokydayete voroha ta) prosyte prytulku z vamy, vy budete vyprobuvaty yikh. BOH znaye tsilkom yikhnyu viru. Odnoho razu vy vstanovlyuyete shcho vony viruyuchi, vy ne budete povernuty yim do disbelievers. Vony ne ye zakonnyy zalyshytysya odruzheni yim, ne budutʹ disbelievers budutʹ dozvoleni shchob odruzhytysya z nymy. Dayte nazad posah shcho disbelievers rozplatylysya. Vy ne zdiysnyuyete pomylku odruzhuyuchysʹ yim, stilʹky, skilʹky vy platyte yim yikhni nalezhni posah. Ne utrymayte disbelieving zhinky (yakshcho vony bazhayutʹ pryyednatysya do voroha). Vy mozhete poprosyty yikh dlya posahu vy rozplatylysya, ta vony mozhutʹ poprosyty shcho vony rozplatylysya. Tse ye BOZHE pravylo; Vin upravlyaye sered vas. BOH Omniscient, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

Yakshcho budʹ-yaki vashi zhinky pryyednuyutʹsya do taboru vorohiv, ta vy prymushuyetesʹ shchob borotysʹ, vy budete prymusyty voroha kompensuvaty lyudyam kotrym zahubyly yikhnikh zhinok, dayuchy yim shcho vony vytratyly na yikhnikh zhinkakh. Vy budete BOH povahy, u komu vy vvazhayete

O vy prorok, koly viryachyy zhinkam (khto pokynuv disbelievers) shchob shukaty prytulku z vamy zastavy do vas shcho vony ne vstanovlyatʹ budʹ-yakykh idoliv krim BOHA, ne vykradayutʹ, ne zdiysnyuyutʹ adyulʹter, ne ubyvayutʹ yikhnikh ditey, ne vyhotovlyayutʹ budʹ-yakyy falsehood, ne ne pidkoryayutʹsya vashym spravedlyvym zamovam, vy budete vyznaty yikhnyu zastavu, ta budete molytysya do BOHA prostyty yikh. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne befriend lyudy z kym BOH hnivayetʹsya, ta khto beznadiyno prykleyuyutʹsya u disbelief; vony ye tilʹky takyy beznadiynyy yak disbelievers khto ye vzhe u graves
Glorifying BOH vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
O vy shcho vvazhayete, chomu vy kazhete yaki vy ne robyte
Naybilʹsh abominable u vydovyshchi BOHA shcho vy kazhete yaki vy ne robyte
BOH lyubytʹ tsi khto boryutʹsya u Yoho prychyni z'yednavsya u odniy koloni, lyublyatʹ tsehlu u odniy stini

Vidklykannya shcho Moses skazanyy yoho lyudyam, "O moyi lyudy, chomu vy zavdayete bilʹ meni, nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vy znayete shcho ya ye BOZHYY kur'yer do vas?" Koly vony deviated, BOH vidviv yikhni serdenʹka. Dlya BOHA ne keruye bezputnymy lyudʹmy

Vidklykannya shcho Isus, syn Mary, skazav, "O Dity Izrayilya, ya ye BOZHYY kur'yer do vas, pidtverdzhuyuchy Torah ta pryvedennya harna novyna kur'yera prybuty pislya meni chyya nazva bude navitʹ bilʹshe khvalytysya (Ahmad)." Todi, koly vin pokazav yim yasni dokazy, vony skazaly, "Tse ye hlyboke zacharuvannya
Khto bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh odyn khto vyhotovlyaye brekhnyu pro BOHA, ta vin zaproshuyetʹsya do Podannya? BOH ne keruye z·hubnymy lyudʹmy
Vony bazhayutʹ vydobuty BOZHE svitlo z yikhnimy hyrlamy. Ale BOH napolyahaye na perfecting Yoho svitlo, nezvazhayuchy na disbelievers
Vin poslav Yoho kur'yeru z kerivnytstvom ta virnoyu relihiyeyu, ta vstyhne dominate vsi relihiya, nezvazhayuchy na idola worshipers
O vy shcho vvazhayete, dozvoleni Meni informuyete vas torhivli shcho vryatuyete vas z bolisnoho retribution
Viryatʹ v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru ta dokladayutʹ zusylʹ v im'ya BOHA z vashymy hroshamy ta vashymy zhyttyam. Tse yavlyaye soboyu krashchu uhodu dlya vas, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, Vin probachaye vashym hrikham, ta dopuskaye vas u park z techuchymy potokamy, z krasyvymy osobnyakamy u parku Eden. Tse yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Dodatkovo, vy otrymuyete shchosʹ vy spravdi lyubyte: pidtrymayte z BOHA ta harantovanoyi peremohy. Dayte harna novyna viruyucham

O vy shcho vvazhayete, vyhlyadayete BOZHI prykhylʹnyky, yak poslidovnyky Isusa, syna Mary. Koly vin skazav yim, "Khto moyi prykhylʹnyky do BOHA," vony skazaly, "My ye BOZHI prykhylʹnyky." Otzhe, hrupa z Ditey Izrayilya vvazhala, ta insha hrupa disbelieved. My dopomohly tsym khto vvazhaly proty yikhnʹoho voroha, do vony peremohly
Glorifying BOH vse u nebi ta vse na zemli; Korolʹ, naybilʹsh Svyashchennyy, Mohutniy, naybilʹsh Mudryy

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto poslav do gentiles kur'yer z chysla yim, shchob deklamuvaty yim Yoho vidkryttya, ochyshchayutʹ yikh, ta navchayutʹ yikh svyate pysannya ta wisdom. Pered tse, vony poyikhaly daleko astray
Ta bahato heneratsiy nastupnykh yim. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Takyy BOZHA charivnistʹ shcho Vin daruye whomever Vin wills. BOH Possessor Neobmezhenoyi Charivnosti

pryklad tsykh komu buly danyy Torah, todi ne spromihsya uphold tse, vyhlyadaye yak vislyuk nosyachi velyki pratsi literatury. Neshchasnyy diysno yavlyaye soboyu pryklad lyudey kotrykh vidkhylyv BOZHI vidkryttya. BOH ne keruye bezputnymy lyudʹmy
Kazhete, "O vy shcho ye yevreysʹki, yakshcho vy zayavlyayete shcho vy ye BOZHI vybrani, za vynyatkom vsikh inshykh lyudey, todi vy musyte sumuvaty za smertyu yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vony budutʹ nikoly ne sumuvaty za tse, vnaslidok yaki vony zdiysnyly. BOH znaye tsilkom bezputnyy
Kazhete, smertʹ shcho vy namahayetesya unykaty spiymayete z vamy shvydshe abo piznishe. Todi vy budete vertatysya do Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy, todi Vin poinformuye vas vse vy zrobyly

O vy shcho vvazhayete, koly Congregational Molytva (Salat Alʹ-Jumu`ah) oholoshuyetʹsya u P'yatnytsyu, vy budete hasten do svyatkuvannya BOHA, ta upuskayete vesʹ biznes. Tse ye krashche dlya vas, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Odnoho razu molytva zavershuyetʹsya, vy mozhete rozpovsyudytysya cherez zemlyu shukaty BOZHYKH shchedrosti, ta prodovzhuyetesya z·hadaty BOHA chasto, shcho vy mozhete maty uspikh

Koly deyakyy z nykh zustrichayutʹ dilovu uhodu, abo deyaka rozvaha, vony kydayutʹsya yomu ta lyshayutʹ vas vstanovleni! Skazhitʹ, "Shcho BOH volodiye daleko krashche nizh rozvaha abo biznes. BOH yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho Provaydera
Koly lytsemiry prybuvayutʹ do vas yak kazhutʹ, "My dayemo svidchennya shcho vy yavlyayete soboyu kur'yera BOHA." BOH znaye shcho vy ye Yoho kur'yer, ta BOH daye svidchennya shcho lytsemiry brekhuny
Pid guise yikhnʹoyi ochevydnoyi viry, vony vidkhylyayutʹ lyudey z shlyakhu BOHA. Neshchasnyy diysno yaki vony
Tse tomu, shcho vony vvazhaly, todi disbelieved. Otzhe, yikhni rozum blokuyutʹsya; vony ne rozumiyutʹ

Koly vy bachyte yikh, vy mozhete buty vrazheni yikhnimy pohlyadamy. Ta koly vony rozmovlyayutʹ, vy mozhete poslukhaty yikhnyu krasnomovnistʹ. Vony vyhlyadayutʹ yak postiyni kolody. Vony dumayutʹ shcho kozhnyy vyklyk mayetʹsya namir proty nykh. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnykh vorohiv; ber yikh. BOH zasudzhuye yikh; vony deviated
Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Prybuvayutʹ dozvoleni kur'yeru BOHA mollyatʹsya za vash forgiveness," vony mockingly povertayutʹ yikhni holovy, ta vy bachyte yikh vidkhylyayete inshi ta akt zukhvalo
Tse yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy dlya nykh, vy molytesʹ za chy yikhniy forgiveness, abo ne molytesʹ za yikhniy forgiveness; BOH ne prostytʹ yikh. Dlya BOHA ne keruye bezputnymy lyudʹmy

Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto kazhutʹ, "Ne dayutʹ budʹ-yaki hroshi tsym khto proslidkuvaly za kur'yerom BOHA, mozhlyvo vony pokydayutʹ yoho!" Ale, BOH volodiye skarbamy neba ta zemli, ale lytsemiry ne rozumiyutʹ

Yak kazhutʹ, "Yakshcho my idemo nazad do mista, potuzhnoho tam budemo evict slabyy (ta my budemo victimized)." (Vony musyatʹ znaty shcho) vsya hidnistʹ nalezhytʹ BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta viruyucham. Ale, lytsemiry ne znayutʹ
O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne distracted vashymy hroshamy ta vashymy ditʹmy z pam'yatayuchoho BOHA. Tsey khto roblyatʹ tse yavlyayutʹ soboyu losers

Vy budete daty z nashykh umov vam pered tym, yak smertʹ prybuvaye do vas, todi vy kazhete, "Miy Lord, yakby tilʹky Vy mohly zatrymaty tse dlya korotke v toy chas, yak! YA by todi budu blahodiynyy ta pryyednuyusʹ spravedlyvyy
BOH nikoly ne zatrymuye pryznachenyy chas smerti dlya budʹ-yakoyi dushi. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
Glorifying BOH vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Yomu nalezhytʹ vsʹomu tsaryuvannyu, ta yomu nalezhytʹ vsiy pokhvali, ta Vin Omnipotent
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vas, todi sered vy ye disbeliever, ta viruyuchyy. BOH tsilkom Seer vse vy
Vin utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu dlya spetsyfichnoyi mety, zamysleni vy ta perfected vash proekt, todi yomu yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
Vin znaye vse u nebi ta zemli, ta Vin znaye vse vy prykhovuyete ta vse vy zayavlyayete. BOH znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
vy vidznachyly tsi khto disbelieved ranishe, todi zaznaly naslidkiv yikhnʹoho rishennya? Vony zaznaly bolisnoho retribution

Tse tomu, shcho yikhni kur'yery poyikhaly yim z yasnymy dokazamy, ale vony kazhetʹsya, 'Budutʹ my slidkuyemo humans lyubymo nas?" Vony disbelieved ta prohnanyy. BOH ne potrebuye yikh; BOH ye u ne treba, Praiseworthy

Tsey khto disbelieved pretenziya shcho vony ne budutʹ resurrected! Tak diysno, moyim Lordom, vy budete resurrected, ta vy budete trymatysya vidpovidalʹni za vse vy zrobyly. Tse ye lehke dlya BOHA zrobyty
Tomu, vy budete viryty v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta svitli shcho my vidkryly herein. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy

denʹ prybude koly Vin sklykaye vas do Dnya Sklykayuchoho. Shcho yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Vzayemnoho Osudzhuyuchoho. Tse yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve ta vidkhylyayutʹ nashi vidkryttya, vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu dwellers Hellfire; vony perebuyutʹ tam zavzhdy. Shcho neshchasna dolya
Nichoho ne vidbuvayetʹsya do vas krim u vidpovidnosti do BOZHOHO budete. Budʹ khto khto virytʹ v BOHU, Vin bude keruvaty yoho sertsem. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
Vy budete pidkorytysya BOHU ta vy budete pidkorytysya kur'yeru. Yakshcho vy prohanyayete, todi yedyna misiya nashoho kur'yera musytʹ dostavyty povidomlennya
BOH: nemaye inshoho boha krim Yoho. U BOHU viruyuchi budutʹ dovira
O vy shcho vvazhayete, vashe podruzhzhya ta vashi dity mozhutʹ buty vashi vorohy; beware. Yakshcho vy probachayete, zabuvayete, ta probachayete, todi BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Vashi hroshi ta dity ye test, ta BOH volodiye velykoyu vynahorodoyu

Tomu, vy budete BOH povahy yak bahato tomu shcho vy mozhete, ta slukhayete, ta pidkoryayetesya, ta dayete (do dobrodiynosti) dlya vashoho vlasnoyi harnoyi. Budʹ khto khto zakhyshchayetʹsya z yoho vlasnoho stinginess, tsʹoho yavlyayutʹ soboyu uspishni
Yakshcho vy zychyte BOHU pozyku righteousness, Vin pomnozhytʹ vynahorodu dlya vas mahistralʹ, ta probachayete vam. BOH Appreciative, Clement
Knower vsikh tayemnytsʹ ta deklaratsiy; Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

O vy prorok, koly vy lyudy divorce zhinky, vy budete zabezpechyty shcho divorce tymchasovyy vykonuyetʹsya. Vy budete obmiryty takyy tymchasovyy akuratno. Vy budete BOH povahy vash Lord. Ne evict yim z yikhnikh domivok, ne budutʹ vy robyte dovichnyy neshchasnyy dlya nykh, shchob prymusyty yikh pereyikhaty na yikhnʹomu vlasnyy, yakshcho ne vony zdiysnyuyutʹ proven adyulʹter. Tse - BOZHI zakony. Budʹ khto khto porushuye BOZHI zakony zdiysnyuye nespravedlyvistʹ proty sebe. Vy nikoly ne znayete; mozhlyvo BOH wills shchosʹ harne vytikaty z tse

Odnoho razu tymchasovyy vykonuyetʹsya, vy mozhete posvyatyty z nymy equitably, abo mozhete poyikhaty cherez z rozdilennyam equitably. Vy budete maty dvokh rivnopravnykh svidkiv zasvidchuyete divorce pered tym, yak BOH. Tse musytʹ vysvitlyty tsi khto viryatʹ v BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dnyu. Budʹ khto kotryy BOH povahy, Vin utvorytʹ vykhid dlya nʹoho
Ta zabezpechytʹ dlya nʹoho zvidky vin nikoly ne ochikuvanyy. Budʹ khto khto doviryaye u BOHU, Vin bude dostatniy yo. BOZHI komandy roblyatʹsya. BOH ukhvalyv dlya vse yoho doli

Yak dlya zhinok shcho distalysya menopause, yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yaki sumnivy, yikh tymchasovi budete try misyatsya. Yak dlya tsykh khto ne menstruate, ta zroblyatʹ vidkryttya shcho vony ye vahitni, yikhni tymchasovi kintsi na dayuche narodzhennya. Budʹ khto kotryy BOH povahy, Vin robytʹ vse lehke dlya nʹoho
Tse ye BOZHYY komandnyy shcho Vin posylaye vnyz do vas. Budʹ khto kotryy BOH povahy, Vin vidsylaye yoho hrikhy, ta nahorodzhuye yoho velykodushno

Vy budete dozvolyty yim prozhyty u tomu zhe domi u kotromu vony prozhyly z vamy, ta ne roblyatʹ dovichni takym chynom neshchasni dlya nykh shcho vony lyshayutʹ na yikhnʹomu vlasnyy. Yakshcho vony ye vahitni, vy budete vytratyty na nykh do vony dayutʹ narodzhennya. Yakshcho vony medsestra nemovlya, vy budete zaplatyty yim dlya tsʹoho sluzhbi. Vy budete pidtrymaty pryyazni vidnoshennya sered vas. Yakshcho vy ne pohodzhuyetesya, vy mozhete naynyaty inshu zhinku nyanchyty dytynu

bahatyy cholovik bude zabezpechyty pidtrymku z·hidno z yoho zasobamy, ta bidnymy bude zabezpechyty z·hidno z oznachaye, shcho BOH podaruvav yoho. BOH ne vplyvaye na budʹ-yaku dushu bilʹsh nizh Vin dav tse. BOH zabezpechytʹ lehkistʹ pislya skladnosti
Bahato spilʹnoty protydiyav komandam yoho Lorda ta proty Yoho kur'yeriv. Otzhe, my vlashtuvaly yikh chitko pidzvitni, ta requited yim strashnyy requital

kur'yer shcho deklamuye do vas BOZHI vidkryttya, yasno, shchob pryvesty tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta robota righteousness z temryavy u svitlo. BOH utvoryv sim vsesvit ta te zhe chyslo hruntiv. Komandy techutʹ sered nykh. Tse musytʹ dozvolyty vy znayete shcho BOH Omnipotent, ta shcho BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
O vy prorok, chomu vy zaboronyayete yakoho BOHA zrobyly zakonn dlya vas, tilʹky zadovolʹnyty vashykh zhinok? BOH Forgiver, Myloserdnyy
BOH ukhvalyv dlya vas zakony mayutʹ spravu z vashi klyatvy. BOH ye vash Lord, ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu Omniscient, Naybilʹsh Mudryy

prorok doviryav deyakym z yoho zhinok z pevnym tverdzhennyam, todi odne z nykh rozpovsyudzhenoho tse, ta BOH dozvolyav yomu znayutʹ pro tse. Vin todi poinformuvav yoho druzhynu chastyny pytannya, ta disregarded chastyna. Vona poprosyla yoho, "Khto poinformuvav vas tse?" Vin skazav, "ya buv poinformovanyy Omniscient, Naybilʹsh Cognizant

Yakshcho dva z vy kayetesya do BOHA, todi vashi serdenʹka poslukhaly. Ale yakshcho vy diapazon razom proty yoho, todi BOH ye yoho soyuznyk, ta tak Gabriel ta spravedlyvi viruyuchi. Takozh, anhely ye yoho helpers

Yakshcho vin divorces vy, yoho Lord zaminytʹ inshykh zhinok u vashomu mistsi khto krashche nizh vy; submitters (Muslims), viruyuchi (Mu'mins), slukhnyanyy, repentant, worshipers, nabizhnyy, abo ranishe odruzhenyy, abo divy

O vy shcho disbelieved, ne pereproshuyete sʹohodni. Vy requited tilʹky za shcho vy

Na shcho denʹ, BOH ne rozcharuye proroka ta tsey khto vvazhaly z nym. Yikhnye svitlo bude syayaty pered nymy ta yikh vypravytysya. Vony skazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, doskonale nashe svitlo dlya nas, ta probachayutʹ nam; Vy Omnipotent
O prorok, borotʹba proty disbelievers ta lytsemiry ta budutʹ suvori z nymy. Yikhniy abode Gehenna, ta neshchasna dolya

Takozh Mary, Amramite. Vona pidtrymala yiyi chastity, todi my poduly u yiyi z nashoho dukh. Vona viryla v slovam yiyi Lorda ta Yoho svyatykh pysannya; vona bula slukhnyana
Naybilʹsh exalted yavlyaye soboyu u chyyikh rukakh ye vse tsaryuvannya, ta Vin Omnipotent
khto utvoryv smertʹ ta zhyttya dlya mety rozriznyuyuchoyi tsiyeyi sered vas shcho by zrobyly krashche. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Probachayuchyy
Vin utvoryv sim vsesvit u verstvakh. Vy ne bachyte budʹ-yakyy imperfection u stvorenni naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvomu. Utrymayte dyvlyatʹsya; vy bachyte budʹ-yaku vadu
Dyvlyatʹsya znov ta znov; vashi ochi povernutʹsya stumped ta zavoyovanyy
My prykrasyly naybilʹsh nyzʹkyy vsesvit z lampamy, ta pylʹnuvaly yoho kordony z projectiles proty chortiv; my hotovi do nykh retribution u Pekli
Dlya tsykh khto disbelieved u yikhnʹomu Lordi, retribution Gehenna. Shcho neshchasna dolya
Koly vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ kyneni tam, vony chuyutʹ yoho furor yak tse fumes

Vony by vidpoviyily, "Tak diysno; warner prybuvaly do nas, ale my disbelieved ta skazaly, `god ne vidkryly budʹ shcho. Vy povnistyu astray
Vony takozh kazhutʹ, "Yakshcho b my pochuly abo zrozumili, my by ne buly sered dwellers Pekla

Chy vy derzhyte vashu tayemnytsyu vysloviv, abo zayavlyayete yikh, Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky

Inshi pered tym, yak yim disbelieved; yak strashnyy Miy requital
vony ne pobachyly ptakhiv nad nymy vyshykuvalysʹ u kolonakh ta rozpovsyudzhuyutʹ yikhni kryla? Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto trymaye yikh u povitri. Vin Seer vsikh rechey
De tsi soldaty shcho mozhutʹ dopomoha vy proty naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi? Diysno, disbelievers obmanyuyutʹsya
Khto tam zabezpechuyete dlya vas, yakshcho Vin utrymuye Yoho umovy? Diysno, vony porynuly hlyboki u porushennya ta antypatiyu
odyn khto prohulyanky v toy chas, yak slumped nad na yoho oblychchi krashche kerovaniy, abo odyn khto prohulyanky pryamo na pravi shlyakh
Kazhete, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zapochatkuvav vas, ta harantuvaly vam slukhannya, ochi, ta mizky. Ridko vy appreciative
Kazhete, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto rozmistyv vas na zemli, ta pered tym, yak Yo vy budete sklykatysya
Vony vyklyk: "Koly shcho prorotstvo bude prybuvaty do propusku, yakshcho vy budete ye pravdyvi
Kazhutʹ, "Take znannya ye z BOHOM; YA ne ye bilʹsh nizh ochevydnyy warner
Koly vony bachatʹ , shcho tse vidbuvayetʹsya, oblychchya tsykh khto disbelieved povernetʹsya neshchasnyy, ta tse bude proholoshuvatysya: "Tse ye yaki vy zvychayno vysmiyuvaly
Kazhutʹ, BOH vyrishuye 'Chy vynyshchyty meni ta tsey withme, abo do nas zlyvy z Yoho myloserdyam, khto tam zakhyshchayutʹ disbelievers z bolisnoho retribution
Kazhutʹ, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; my virymo v Yomu, ta my doviryayemo u Yo. Vy bezsumnivno znaydete khto diysno daleko astray
Kazhete, "Shcho yakshcho vasha voda zanuryayetʹsya daleko, khto zabezpechytʹ vas z chystoyu vodoyu
